Entry.JapaneseText: そっか！ そういう事か！
Entry.EnglishText: I see! So that's what was up!

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ、いきなり どうしたんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh, what are you going on about all of a sudden?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、<Eugene>が<Blue>思念<White>に取りつかれた時、 どうして<Mao>だけは平気だったかって事。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'm talking about how <Eugene> was okay with <Mao> when he was under the influence of the <Blue>Will<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Mao>は聖獣に作られた存在で、 ガジュマでもヒューマでもないから、でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You mean how <Mao> was made by the Sacred Beasts, and therefore is neither Huma nor Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよー！ おれが思いついたのに！
Entry.EnglishText: What?! But I just came up with that!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなとっくに気付いてたわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The rest of us had already figured it out.
